title: Our partners
intro: Thanks to you and the support of our partners, we can continue to help animals in need. These are people and organizations that understand the importance of empathy, patience, and responsibility towards the most vulnerable.

invite.title: Become our partner
invite.text: The Elepepe's Sanctuary Foundation works to save, treat, and improve the quality of life of animals. We collaborate with individuals and organizations who, like us, genuinely want to help and support our efforts. Partnerships can include supporting aid campaigns and fundraisers, participating in adoption initiatives, educational activities, and joint animal-related projects. We value relationships based on trust, empathy, and a shared goal. If you would like to learn more about our work or see opportunities for collaboration, please contact us via the form. Together, we can do more for those in need.
